title: Emperor - Battle for Dune [PC] [ENGLISH] [ISO]
description:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


 1. Mount and Install Emperor - Battle for Dune. (In admin mode and run it under WinXP mode)
 2. Apply the 1.09 patch.
 3. Copy crack in the game directory.


Game Lagging


 Turn off target lines in the Game options, and the multi unit select lag will disappear.


IMPORTANT NOTE!


 If you cannot install the game try the "Use only in case normal install fails" folder and select one of the two ways to install Emperor. Follow the instructions within. You might have to do this in Admin Mode and under Windows XP Compatibility Mode as well.


Enjoy & Please Seed!
